warezcdn.name: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru
warezcdn.title: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru

imdb.title: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru
imdb.plot: Traumatized by a childhood incident with a friend who took exception to his love of traditional dolls, doll-artisan hopeful Wakana Gojou passes his days as a loner, finding solace in a room at his high school.

episodes.title: Someone Who Lives in the Exact Opposite World as Me
episodes.plot: Gojo still hasn't made any friends due to his low self-esteem and a bitter childhood memory until he meets Marin, a girl who lives in the exact opposite world as him. After discovering Gojo has a passion for making Hina-dolls, Marin asks him to make her a cloth for cosplaying.

episodes.title: Wanna Hurry Up, and Do It?
episodes.plot: Wakana agrees to make the cosplay-dress for Marin. She also asks him to take the measurements for the dress. Wakana gets a surprise visit.

episodes.title: Then Why Don't We?
episodes.plot: Gojou tries to avoid Kitagawa as he gathers attention while he's with her which he thought would make her feel embarrassed. Proving him wrong, she asks him to come out with her for shopping.

episodes.title: Are These Your Girlfriend's?
episodes.plot: Realising there's only two weeks before the cosplay event, Gojou sets aside his personal problems and is determined to make Kitagawa's dress. He reminisces about some words his grandfather once told him.

episodes.title: It's Probably Because This Is the Best Boob Bag Here
episodes.plot: After wearing the dress, Kitagawa is eager to attend the cosplay event. She asked Gojou to come with her.

episodes.title: For Real?!
episodes.plot: Kitagawa is self-conscious around Gojou as she develops feelings towards him. A New customer, Inui Sajuna meets Gojou under awkward circumstances.

episodes.title: A Home Date with the Guy I Wuv Is the Best
episodes.plot: Kitagawa and Gojou decides to go to the cosplay studio with Inui, which she's going to rent. Kitagawa invites Gojou to her house to watch the anime together.

episodes.title: Backlighting Is the Best
episodes.plot: Juju's photographer and younger sister, Shinju Inui, meets Wakana and Marin for the first time. They're shocked at how opposite her appearance is to Sajuna, but they quickly become closer when they excitedly talk about cameras. Later on, Sajuna suggests that they check out the abandoned hospital that they'll be using for their group cosplay but.

episodes.title: A Lot Happened After I Saw That Photo
episodes.plot: Gojo is able to complete the Black Lobelia and Black Lily cosplays thanks to Marin's help. Both Marin and Sajuna try on their cosplays and they're both excited about how nicely they turned out, and Marin is even more excited about their upcoming group cosplay. When the day finally arrives, Marin and Sajuna get an unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: We've All Got Struggles
episodes.plot: Wakana and Shinju's secret plan was a success, which added to the success of their first group cosplay photoshoot. As Juju and Shinju look through the photos from the photoshoot, the sisters find out how they both feel. Meanwhile, Marin and Wakana are enjoying their summer vacation. They were preparing Marin's cosplay for a fighting game character named Veronica-tya, but then a problem arises.

episodes.title: I Am Currently at a Love Hotel
episodes.plot: Marin and Gojo arrived at a manga cafe to talk about a light novel for Marin's next cosplay. Then, to please Gojo, Marin searched for a photo-shooting studio. Things went haywire when Gojo realized that Marin booked a love hotel. How will things turn out in this awkward situation?

episodes.title: My Dress-Up Darling
episodes.plot: Marin wants to go to the summer festival but can't due to not finishing her homework. Gojo decides to go over and help her and than to visit the summer festival.
